job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtWho are weltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtSidewalk Labs is an urban innovation company that tackles cities greatest challenges We create products and solutions invest in new companies and help developers build more sustainable innovative and equitable places around the world Our ambitious vision requires us to push ourselves beyond conventional thinking and we work hard in pursuit of our mission Our crossdisciplinary team consists of experts from real estate urban planning government finance technology and engineering among other backgroundsltbrgtltbrgtOur urban innovations include Delve a generative design product that empowers real estate teams to design better faster with less risk Mesa an easyinstall kit for commercial buildings that cuts energy costs improves tenant comfort and simplifies building operations Pebble a lowcost vehicle sensor to help manage parking and curb space and Affordable Electrification a new way to manage home energy use to meet a customers monthly budget Were also developing an offsite construction company that can deliver highquality mass timber buildings for more sustainable living and workingltbrgtltbrgtWith the potential to radically improve quality of life in cities for all our work is both exciting and complex We are working to achieve something unprecedented  help us build itltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat is the roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTo significantly improve sustainability in cities Sidewalk Labs is developing new technology that will drastically reduce greenhouse gas emissions compared to the status quo enable smarter management of resources and reduce the cost of future upgrades and maintenanceltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for initiativetaking Machine Learning Software Engineers to join our development of Mesa our affordable energysaving offering for commercial real estate more on the product here Your first project will be building machine learning software that ingests large and diverse data sets from buildings aids in reducing energy use and enables intelligent management of buildings through sensors and connected infrastructure ltbrgtltbrgtIts a bonus but not a requirement if you are familiar with building systems and IoT sensors their data and analysis of it eg HVAC occupancy temperature electric loads etcltbrgtltbrgtWhat is required is a passion for sustainability to reduce the worlds emissions affordablyltbrgtltbrgtWe encourage engineers of all experience levels to apply and will determine your level within Sidewalk Labs based on interview performanceltbrgtltbrgtNote We are currently working remotely and we expect to eventually reopen our offices when it is safe to return in 2021 After reopening candidates will be expected to come into the New York officeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Will AchieveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWithin your first few months you should haveltligtltulgtltligtBuilt a deep understanding of the teams current initiatives and technology infrastructure Python and Typescript running on the Google Cloud Platform coding style and standardsltligtltligtFamiliarized yourself with our current ML pipelineltligtltligtContributed code to the repositoryltligtltulgtltligtFrom there your role will continue to develop and change over time We are a small team working on an early stage product Future projects may includeltligtltulgtltligtWork with building energy experts to develop test and evaluate new control algorithms to improve buildings energy efficiency and surface operational insightsltligtltligtBuild tools and systems to scale deployment of models and pipelinesltligtltligtDevelop models and systems to detect problems or anomalies in buildings and surface them to usersltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We ExpectltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtKnow your software engineeringltligtltulgtltligtHave a strong CS background in order to choose the right algorithms systems approaches and patterns to solve problems without reinventing the wheelltligtltligtCandidates need to be able to hit the ground running Therefore for this role we are looking for 2 years of industry experienceltligtltligtExperience with Python and frameworks such as Numpy and Pandas  plus at least one systems programming language Python C Java or GoltligtltligtExperience building and owning machine learning pipelines endtoend Bonus points forltligtltulgtltligtWork on optimizing the built environmentltligtltligtExperience with HVAC or IoT systemsltligtltulgtltulgtltligtAct as a technologistltligtltulgtltligtBias towards action and shipping Once youve sketched out an idea you find the fastest path to a prototype to prove the conceptltligtltligtStrong ability to write production code quicklyltligtltligtYou are obsessed with privacy and constantly ask how we can build privacy into product designltligtltligtBe comfortable with a range of languages and open source tools and frameworks and make good decisions about which to use to solve a particular problem You are excited to learn something new when the need arises ltligtltulgtltligtSolve problems togetherltligtltulgtltligtCome up with novel solutions working well with technologists and nontechnologists alikeltligtltligtAsk hard questions and challenge assumptions to ensure that were solving the right problemsltligtltligtHave flexibility to work on the teams most pressing problemsltligtltulgtltligtCare ltligtltulgtltligtAbout cities solving hard problems and our teams successltligtltligtYou are committed to creating more equitable and inclusive outcomes both in the workplace and in the work you doltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtAre you a machine learning engineer interested in Sidewalk Labs but are not sure this is the right role for you No worries please apply to our generalist position here All applicants will be considered for any open position on our teamsltbrgtltbrgtWe are very excited to hear from youltbrgtltbrgtSidewalk Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity employer We actively seek applicants from underrepresented communities Even if you are not 100 sure you are right for the role please apply and we will be happy to consider your application All employment is based on merit and business need and we respond to each application we receive
